matrix-project.description: Compiles APP SDK Solutions on Windows all possible configurations and platforms.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAJOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Major number for the APP SDK

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MINOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Minor number for the APP SDK

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SUBMINOR_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is ignored if the value is 0, otherwise the version number changes to MajorNum.MinorNum-Subminor.Buildnumber

com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.name: BOLTLIB_VERSION
com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.description: The version of Bolt libraries being used.

com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.name: TBB_VERSION
com.seitenbau.jenkins.plugins.dynamicpar.description: The version of Intel Thread Building Block libraries.

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_OPENCV
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: The OpenCV build to be used.

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_OPENCL
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: OpenCL build to use to build APP SDK

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultSubject: CAS Build System: APPSDK Windows Build: $BUILD_STATUS!
hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

APPSDK Windows Build Notification

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $MAJOR_NUMBER.$MINOR_NUMBER.$BUILD_NUMBER
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: $JOB_URL
Build Console: $BUILD_URL/console

AMD | AMD Central
